Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Paccanīya-nahetu
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Paccanīya-nahetu
34.
205Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
206Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ; khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ; bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
